code: import React,{createContext,useContext,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QueryContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const QueryProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[query,setQuery]=useState(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QueryContext.Provider,{value:{query,setQuery},children:children});};export const useQuery=()=>{const context=useContext(QueryContext);if(!context){throw new Error("useQuery must be used within a QueryProvider");}const{query,setQuery}=context;const setQueryByIndex=(index,value)=>{setQuery(prevQuery=>{const updatedQuery=[...prevQuery];updatedQuery[index]=value;return updatedQuery;});};return{query,setQueryByIndex};};
